body: $FGI This tiny float thing is funny. I know that we all feel bad when the price moves down (I certainly do
created_at: as my holding is sizable). But keep in mind that it is a micro float. If you feel bad about the price
column3: just change it. I do that when I feel not great about the broader picture. You just offer shares a little over the offer in little bits up the line and bring the price back up. I ALMOST got it back to $2.32 today.

body: The other thing I do is work FGI into online posts whenever I can. I also made a Reddit board just for FGI where I publish the earnings call transcripts so that anybody (including all of us) can quote from them when pushing the stock.
I know we wish the company would provide gimmicks to promote itself better. When they have real news
created_at: I absolutely am sure they will share it. Last earnings call intimated a major upcoming announcement.
